exceptions.exn: In environment K : AbsRing x : K P : R_UniformSpace -> Prop eps : posreal Heps : forall y : R_UniformSpace, ball (abs x) eps y -> P y y : AbsRing_UniformSpace K Hy : ball x eps y The term "y" has type "UniformSpace.sort (AbsRing_UniformSpace K)" while it is expected to have type "UniformSpace.sort R_UniformSpace".

original: unfold continuous. unfold filterlim. intros P [eps Heps]. unfold locally. exists eps. intros y Hy. unfold abs. apply (Heps y Hy).
